players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead on the first night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we identify the mafia among us."
You: "Charlie's death is a tragic reminder of the dangers we face. I propose we focus on gathering information and building trust within our group to uncover the truth about Charlie's killer."

Diana: "Based on the information we have, it seems that one of us is the mafia. I propose that we all share our observations and suspicions during the night to help identify the culprit. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our group."

Bob: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. Let's work together to uncover the truth about Charlie's death and bring the mafia to justice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
